Name: Fightttris VR
About the game: Fightttris VR is the game in which you need to catch blocks, build wall, collect bonuses and attack the enemy in the funniest ways. Be ready to strain your muscles and brain. The speed of reaction, accuracy of movement and clarity of mind - all you need to win. Key features Catch the falling blocks - use your moves to manipulate, grab and build. Collect lines - stack the blocks in lines to erase them, to restore health and to damage the opponent. Activate bonuses - try to overcome the opponent in the fastest way possible. ... Laugh at your opponent - or together with him!
